full_summary:
### Replacement of Roofs at the Embassy of Canada to Haiti, in Port-au-Prince
#### [French Title]: Remplacement de toits à l'ambassade du Canada à Haïti à Port-au-Prince
#### Reference No.: cb-6112-81068873
#### Solicitation No.: 23-239841

**Project Overview**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites eligible contractors to participate in the Replacement of Roofs at the Embassy of Canada to Haiti, in Port-au-Prince. This project involves the removal and replacement of two (2) roofs, including but not limited to:

* Removal and disposal of the existing waterproofing membrane and roofing materials
* Repairs to damages and cracks in the roof deck
* Removal and reinstallation of electrical, mechanical, and HVAC components as needed

**Request for Qualifications (RFQ)**

To prequalify contractors, DFATD requires interested suppliers to submit a response to this RFQ. The response must demonstrate that the contractor meets the prequalification requirements outlined in this document.

**Prequalification Requirements**

Contractors must be capable of providing the full range of services required in English or French and have the ability to travel to and perform work in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. Contractors must also be able to:

* Exercise logistical efficiency during the construction process
* Provide materials and services that match or exceed the quality of current materials and membranes
* Obtain approval from a departmental representative prior to installation

**Tender Notice Details**

* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Foreign (Port-au-Prince, Haiti)

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Eric Rainville
Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
(343) 572-7269
realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca

**Attachment**

Tender documents, including the Request for Qualification (RFQ) and specifications, can be found at: [link]

This RFQ will remain open until 14:00 on 2023-06-20.

We have removed the redundant information and presented the information in a more streamlined format.

We have also added headings and bullet points to make the information easy to read and navigate.

In this version, we have aimed to:

* Remove unnecessary words and phrases
* Use proper punctuation and sentence structure
* Make the language clear and concise
